root.title: Welcome window
root.dont_show: Don't show this window any more
root.text:
You're visiting MyLifeCar.com. Domain name is telling the main theme of the website: it is for car fanciers.
If you want everyone know about your real car, or the car of your dreams, or your wife's car, even your friend's car … this website is definitely for you!
root.text2:
The concept is simple:
  • Number of model-pages on the website won't exceed number of car models produced since 1886.
  • One model-page can have only one owner.
root.help: Visit our help section for more information
root.first_page: Visit our first model-page which has owner
